title: Wherever D
clause_text: Wherever D.P. Road passes through slum; entire 100 percent F.S.I. of the road may be given for utilization in the same site on the remaining area of such plot.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Wherever D.P. Road passes through slum; entire 100 percent F.S.I. of the road may be given for utilization in the same site on the remaining area of such plot.
